category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED segment
name: mikroe.click.utl7segb
short_description: UT-L 7-SEG B Click is a compact add-on board that presents an easy solution for adding a numeric or hexadecimal display to your application. This board features two blue JSS-5611BUB-21s, ultra-thin single-digit numeric displays from Ningbo Junsheng Electronics. The displays are medium (0.56 inches in height) and can display letters, numbers, and symbols in a highly readable form. The host MCU can control the light intensity of the red segments of the display.
